definition: used of a person in the first year of an experience (especially in United States high school or college), a first-year undergraduate
details:
adjective
- used of a person in the first year of an experience (especially in United States high school or college)
= example: used of a person in the first year of an experience (especially in United States high school or college)
= synonyms: first-year
noun
- a first-year undergraduate
= synonyms: fresher
- any new participant in some activity
= synonyms: starter
